description: Write scenarios in plain English with concrete, real values. Every Given/When/Then scenario MUST include an examples table with actual data (no placeholders). Example: 'Given user has typed request message start shaping' plus examples showing the exact message and expected outcome.

do.description: Plain English scenarios with concrete values and required examples. Example: 'Given user has attached documents' plus examples showing document names and expected results.

example: Given user has typed request message 'start shaping'
Then AI Chat identifies story shaping keywords
Given user has attached documents to chat window
And user has typed request message 'start shaping'

guidance.description: Always include examples table with actual data for every scenario that has Given/When/Then steps

dont.description: Don't use variables/placeholders or omit examples. Example: '<request_message>' variable (wrong), or Given/When/Then steps without an examples table (wrong).

example: Given user has typed request message '<request_message>' (WRONG - has variable)

guidance.description: Don't omit examples when scenarios have steps
example: Given user has typed request message 'start shaping' (WRONG - no examples table provided)
